descriptions.semantic_description: Database field patient_id (bigint) - PK. Entity: patient. Concepts: patient identifier, medical record number, patient ID. Context: healthcare, person, identifier, medical.
Database field provider_id (int) - FK. Entity: healthcare provider. Concepts: provider identifier, NPI number, healthcare provider. Context: healthcare, professional, identifier, medical.
Database field email_address (varchar). Entity: email address. Concepts: email address, contact email, electronic mail. Context: contact, communication, electronic, address.
Database field phone_number (varchar). Entity: phone number. Concepts: phone number, telephone, contact number. Context: contact, communication, telephone, number.
Database field status (varchar). Entity: record status. Concepts: status indicator, record status, active status. Context: status, state, workflow, business.
Database field birth_date (date). Entity: birth date. Concepts: birth date, date of birth, birth information. Context: temporal, personal, birth, demographic.
